dt-option.name: language.stateRestore.removeJoiner
dt-option.summary: Set the joiner used between states within the StateRestore remove modal

type.description: The string that will be displayed between the last two states in the `-init language.stateRestore.removeConfirm` option.

dt-option.description: This string is displayed in the confirmation modal for removal between the last two states in the list. The default is `' and '`, meaning that a typical ending to the `-init language.stateRestore.removeConfirm` message would be `... State 1 and State 2?`.

example.title: Change joiner text within remove confirmation modal to french
